lead_paragraph: Mr. Hill’s cabaret show “I’ve Been in Love Before” at the Metropolitan Room is an expansive tribute to Frank Loesser, featuring 29 of the Broadway songwriter’s works.

headline.print_headline: Once, and Always, in Love With Loesser
headline.main: Review: Arlo Hill, Always in Love With Loesser

snippet: Mr. Hill’s cabaret show “I’ve Been in Love Before” at the Metropolitan Room is an expansive tribute to Frank Loesser, featuring 29 of the Broadway songwriter’s works.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert of Frank Loesser's Broadway songs performed by theater singer Arlo Hill at Metropolitan Room.
